info.title: Users and authentication
info.description: A service that manages users and authentication to various services

get.description: Deletes all the sessions that have expired
Cleans old login tokens from the database
Cleans old account merge tokens from the database

post.description: Takes a user's auth token, and logs-out the session associated with it
Logout of a specific session
Logout all sessions for the current user except their current session
Take a user's session token and refresh it, also returns a new authentication token

get.description: Gets all of the sessions that are associated with the currently logged in user

post.description: Redeems a login token for credentials
Changes the user's current password to a new one, also adds a password to the account if there is none
Checks if an email is available for signup
Checks if an phone is available for signup
Attaches a Facebook account to an existing user account, returns the URL the browser should be redirected to
Detaches a Facebook account from an existing user account.

get.description: The endpoint that Facebook redirects the browser to after the user has authenticated
Gets the URL the front-end should redirect the browser to in order to be authenticated with Facebook, and then register

post.description: Confirms that a reset has been completed and changes the password to the new one passed in
Attaches a Google account to an existing user account, returns the URL the browser should be redirected to
Detaches a Google account from an existing user account.

get.description: The endpoint that Google redirects the browser to after the user has authenticated
Gets the URL the front-end should redirect the browser to in order to be authenticated with Google, and then register

post.description: Attaches a Instagram account to an existing user account, returns the URL the browser should be redirected to
Detaches a Instagram account from an existing user account.

get.description: The endpoint that Instagram redirects the browser to after the user has authenticated
Gets the URL the front-end should redirect the browser to in order to be authenticated with Instagram, and then register

post.description: Attaches a Linkedin account to an existing user account, returns the URL the browser should be redirected to
Detaches a Linkedin account from an existing user account.

get.description: The endpoint that Linkedin redirects the browser to after the user has authenticated
Gets the URL the front-end should redirect the browser to in order to be authenticated with Linkedin, and then register

post.description: Login a user using an email and password

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: A merge token for merging into an account

post.description: Register a new user with an email and password
Removes using a password as a login method
Send an email to user to get a password reset, responds with no content even if the email is not on any user account

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email of the account to send a password reset

post.description: Attaches a Twitter account to an existing user account, returns the URL the browser should be redirected to
Detaches a Twitter account from an existing user account.

get.description: The endpoint that Twitter redirects the browser to after the user has authenticated
Gets the URL the front-end should redirect the browser to in order to be authenticated with Twitter, and then register
Get a user's details

post.description: Update a user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the user to be deactivated when admin is deactivating a user

parameters.name: admin
parameters.description: whether admin is requesting this deactivation

get.description: Returns whether Oauth is attached or not

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: The ID of the requested user. If this is not provide, get currently logged in user

get.description: Resend otp for phone verification

post.description: Resends a verify email for the current user, also invalidates the link on the previously send email verification

get.description: Update Phone and send an OTP to entered phone for verification

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country code of the phone entered

get.description: Verify phone with entered phone
Validates an email address, designed to be called by users directly in their browser

token.description: A merge token for merging into an account

SessionResponseBody.title: Mediatype identifier: session; view=default

browser.description: The browser and browser version connected with this session

id.example: Rerum maxime in delectus quo ut eos.

ip.description: The last IP address where this session was used

isMobile.description: Whether the session was from a mobile device

lastUsed.description: Time that this session was last used

latitude.description: The latitude of the last known location of the session

location.description: A humanReadable string describing the last known location of the session
location.example: Molestiae nihil adipisci facere ullam iure asperiores.

longitude.description: The longitude of the last known location of the session
longitude.example: Facilis perferendis ipsam pariatur placeat expedita.

mapUrl.description: The URL of the Google map to show the location, suitable for using in an img tag

os.description: The OS of the system where this session was used

userId.description: ID of the user this session is for
userId.example: Nemo aut et voluptatem autem earum.

SessionResponseBody.description: A session for a user, associated with a specific browser

example.id: Itaque soluta exercitationem quod nihil repudiandae.
example.latitude: Sunt quia harum ut dolor repellat.
example.mapUrl: Repellendus aliquam sit earum voluptatem natus.
